verses.text: And the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, put \w forth|strong="H2330"\w* a \w riddle|strong="H2420"\w*, and \w speak|strong="H4911"\w* a \w parable|strong="H4912"\w* unto the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*;

And \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; A \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w*, \w longwinged|strong="H0083"\w*, \w full|strong="H4392"\w* of \w feathers|strong="H5133"\w*, which had divers \w colours|strong="H7553"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the highest \w branch|strong="H6788"\w* of the \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*:\f + \fr 17.3 \ft divers…: Heb. embroidering\f*

He cropped \w off|strong="H6998"\w* the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of his young \w twigs|strong="H3242"\w*, and \w carried|strong="H0935"\w* it into a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w traffick|strong="H3667"\w*; he \w set|strong="H7760"\w* it in a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w merchants|strong="H7402"\w*.

He \w took|strong="H3947"\w* also of the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w planted|strong="H5414"\w* it in a \w fruitful|strong="H2233"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*; he \w placed|strong="H3947"\w* \add it\add* by \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \add and\add* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* it \add as\add* a willow \w tree|strong="H6851"\w*.\f + \fr 17.5 \ft planted…: Heb. put it in a field of seed\f*

And it \w grew|strong="H6779"\w*, and became a \w spreading|strong="H5628"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* of \w low|strong="H8217"\w* \w stature|strong="H6967"\w*, whose \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* \w turned|strong="H6437"\w* toward him, and the \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* thereof were under him: so it became a \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*, and brought \w forth|strong="H6213"\w* \w branches|strong="H0905"\w*, and \w shot|strong="H7971"\w* forth \w sprigs|strong="H6288"\w*.

There was also \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* and \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w feathers|strong="H5133"\w*: and, behold, this \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* did \w bend|strong="H3719"\w* her \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* toward him, and shot \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* her \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* toward him, that he might \w water|strong="H8248"\w* it by the \w furrows|strong="H6170"\w* of her \w plantation|strong="H4302"\w*.

It was \w planted|strong="H8362"\w* in a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w soil|strong="H7704"\w* by \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, that it might bring \w forth|strong="H6213"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w*, and that it might \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, that it might be a \w goodly|strong="H0155"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w*.\f + \fr 17.8 \ft soil: Heb. field\f*

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* thou, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Shall it \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*? shall he not pull \w up|strong="H5423"\w* the \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* thereof, and cut \w off|strong="H7082"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof, that it \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*? it shall \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* in all the \w leaves|strong="H2964"\w* of her \w spring|strong="H6780"\w*, even without \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w power|strong="H2220"\w* or \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* to pluck it \w up|strong="H5375"\w* by the \w roots|strong="H8328"\w* thereof.

Yea, behold, \add being\add* \w planted|strong="H8362"\w*, shall it \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*? shall it not \w utterly|strong="H3001"\w* \w wither|strong="H3001"\w*, when the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w toucheth|strong="H5060"\w* it? it shall \w wither|strong="H3001"\w* in the \w furrows|strong="H6170"\w* where it \w grew|strong="H6780"\w*.
¶ Moreover the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* now to the \w rebellious|strong="H4805"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w Know|strong="H3045"\w* ye not what these \add things mean\add*? \w tell|strong="H0559"\w* \add them\add*, Behold, the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thereof, and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof, and \w led|strong="H0935"\w* them with him to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*;

And hath \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4410"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w*, and \w made|strong="H3772"\w* a \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with him, and hath \w taken|strong="H0935"\w* an \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* of him: he hath also \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* the \w mighty|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*:\f + \fr 17.13 \ft taken an…: Heb. brought him to an oath\f*

That the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* might be \w base|strong="H8217"\w*, that it might not lift itself \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \add but\add* that by \w keeping|strong="H8104"\w* of his \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* it might \w stand|strong="H5975"\w*.\f + \fr 17.14 \ft but…: Heb. to keep his covenant, to stand to it\f*

But he \w rebelled|strong="H4775"\w* against him in \w sending|strong="H7971"\w* his \w ambassadors|strong="H4397"\w* into \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, that they might \w give|strong="H5414"\w* him \w horses|strong="H5483"\w* and \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*. Shall he \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w*? shall he \w escape|strong="H4422"\w* that \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* such \add things\add*? or shall he \w break|strong="H6565"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and be \w delivered|strong="H4422"\w*?

\add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*, surely in the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \add where\add* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \add dwelleth\add* that made him \w king|strong="H4427"\w*, whose \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* he \w despised|strong="H0959"\w*, and whose \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* he \w brake|strong="H6565"\w*, \add even\add* with him in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* he shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

Neither shall \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* with \add his\add* \w mighty|strong="H1419"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* and \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w company|strong="H6951"\w* \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for him in the \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, by casting \w up|strong="H8210"\w* \w mounts|strong="H5550"\w*, and \w building|strong="H1129"\w* \w forts|strong="H1785"\w*, to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w persons|strong="H5315"\w*:

Seeing he \w despised|strong="H0959"\w* the \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* by \w breaking|strong="H6565"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, when, lo, he had \w given|strong="H5414"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* all these \add things\add*, he shall not \w escape|strong="H4422"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; \add As\add* I \w live|strong="H2416"\w*, surely mine \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* that he hath \w despised|strong="H0959"\w*, and my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* that he hath \w broken|strong="H6331"\w*, even it will I \w recompense|strong="H5414"\w* upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

And I will \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* my \w net|strong="H7568"\w* upon him, and he shall be \w taken|strong="H8610"\w* in my \w snare|strong="H4686"\w*, and I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and will \w plead|strong="H8199"\w* with him there for his \w trespass|strong="H4603"\w* that he hath \w trespassed|strong="H4604"\w* against me.

And all his \w fugitives|strong="H4015"\w* with all his \w bands|strong="H0102"\w* shall \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and they that \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* shall be \w scattered|strong="H6566"\w* toward all \w winds|strong="H7307"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \add it\add*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; I will also \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the highest \w branch|strong="H6788"\w* of the \w high|strong="H7311"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*, and will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \add it;\add* I will crop \w off|strong="H6998"\w* from the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of his young \w twigs|strong="H3127"\w* a tender \w one|strong="H7390"\w*, and will \w plant|strong="H8362"\w* \add it\add* upon an \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* and \w eminent|strong="H8524"\w*:

In the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of the \w height|strong="H4791"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* will I \w plant|strong="H8362"\w* it: and it shall bring \w forth|strong="H5375"\w* \w boughs|strong="H6057"\w*, and \w bear|strong="H6213"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w*, and be a \w goodly|strong="H0117"\w* \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w*: and under it shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* all \w fowl|strong="H6833"\w* of every \w wing|strong="H3671"\w*; in the \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* of the \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* thereof shall they \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w*.

And all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have brought \w down|strong="H8213"\w* the \w high|strong="H1364"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, have \w exalted|strong="H1361"\w* the \w low|strong="H8217"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, have \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* up the \w green|strong="H3892"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*, and have made the \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* to \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w*: I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* and have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.
